name: CW_ABST_HD_ADEQUACY
description: Hemodialysis adequacy information from abstractions with clinical hemodialysis or other dialysis treatment information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: HD_KTV_DATE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's treatment Kt/V collection date.

columns.name: HD_KTV_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's treatment Kt/V calculation method.

columns.name: HD_PRE_BUN_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's pre-dialysis BUN lab value.

columns.name: HD_POST_BUN_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's post-dialysis BUN lab value.

columns.name: HD_PRE_WEIGHT_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's pre-dialysis weight value.

columns.name: HD_PRE_WEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's pre-dialysis weight unit.

columns.name: HD_POST_WEIGHT_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's post-dialysis weight value.

columns.name: HD_POST_WEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's post-dialysis weight unit.

columns.name: HD_BUN_DELIVERED_MINUTES
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's delivered minutes for BUN hemodialysis session.

columns.name: HD_HEIGHT_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's height value.

columns.name: HD_HEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's height unit.

columns.name: HD_CREATININE_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's serum creatinine lab value.

columns.name: HD_CREATININE_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's serum creatinine lab collection date.

columns.name: HD_NPCR_LAB_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's normalized protein catabolic rate value.

columns.name: HD_NPCR_LAB_DATE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's normalized protein catabolic rate collection date.

columns.name: HD_TOTAL_SESSIONS
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's total number of hemodialysis sessions in a reporting month.

columns.name: HD_TARGET_WEIGHT_ASSESSED_YN
columns.description: Shows whether hemodialysis patient's post dialysis target weight assessment is done or not.

columns.name: HD_TARGET_WEIGHT_ASSESSED_DATE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's post-dialysis target weight assessment date.

columns.name: HD_KTV_VALUE
columns.description: The hemodialysis patient's treatment Kt/V value.
